entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.1°C

Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 81 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
